description: Schema for submitting an ontology term.
title: Ontology Term

___definition.description: The definition for the ontology term.
___definition.title: Definition

___parents.description: Ontology terms that are direct parents of this term via subClassOf
___parents.title: Parent terms

___term_name.description: The current valid name for the ontology term.
___term_name.title: Term name

___preferred_name.description: A preferred name (possibly shortened or simpler version) for the ontology term - can be used for submission or retrieval.
___preferred_name.title: Display name

___source_ontologies.title: Ontologies that this term is part of
___source_ontologies.descripton: The ontologies from whence this term EFO, OBI, UBERON

___term_url.description: The url that uniquely identifies term - often purl.
___term_url.title: URL

___namespace.description: The namespace to which the term belongs - relevant for imported ontologies
___namespace.title: Term namespace

___term_id.description: The ID for the ontology term including the prefix.
___term_id.comment: Must be unique in our system
___term_id.title: Term ID

___synonyms.internal_comment: Calculated from term info - cannot be used as ID
___synonyms.title: Synonyms

___is_slim_for.description: If the term is a slim term the value is the slot that the slim is for
___is_slim_for.title: Slim Branch

___slim_terms.description: Ontology terms that are slimmed - less specific that are used in search
___slim_terms.title: Slim terms
